attributes.action: Save the South Downs-Block the Proposed Development at Priory Heights, Eastbourne
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Under the recent Housing Development Plan, Eastbourne Borough Council has proposed to build an estimated 80 homes in and around the field towards the back of Priory Heights.

We must ensure this never happens. This land is part of the proposed National Park and has been enjoyed by the people of Eastbourne for years, to walk, cycle, ride horses, sledge and relax on. It is also the home to lots of local wildlife, including foxes, badgers and horses.
